name: Espresso
description: A classic shot of rich and bold espresso. Perfect for a quick caffeine boost.

name: Americano
description: A smooth and balanced coffee made by adding hot water to a shot of espresso. Great for sipping all day.

name: Cappuccino
description: A delightful blend of equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and frothed milk. Topped with a sprinkle of cocoa powder.

name: Iced Latte
description: A refreshing coffee drink made with a shot of espresso, cold milk, and ice. Perfect for a hot summer day.

name: Macchiato
description: A shot of espresso with a dollop of frothed milk. A minimalist coffee experience.

name: Mocha Frappuccino
description: A blended coffee drink with espresso, milk, chocolate syrup, and ice. Topped with whipped cream and a drizzle of chocolate.

name: Flat White
description: A velvety smooth coffee made with a double shot of espresso and microfoamed milk. A popular choice among coffee connoisseurs.

name: Cortado
description: A balanced coffee drink made with equal parts espresso and steamed milk. Perfect for those who prefer a less milky coffee.

name: Cold Brew
description: A smooth and refreshing coffee brewed with cold water for an extended period. Served over ice.

name: Lungo
description: A longer espresso shot made with more water, resulting in a milder flavor. Ideal for those who enjoy a more diluted coffee.

name: Doppio
description: A double shot of espresso for an extra caffeine kick. Perfect for coffee enthusiasts who need a stronger boost.

name: Nitro Cold Brew
description: A creamy and velvety cold brew coffee infused with nitrogen. Served from a tap for a rich and frothy texture.

name: Iced Americano
description: A crisp and invigorating coffee made by adding cold water and ice to a shot of espresso. A great way to cool down.

name: Affogato
description: A delightful treat made by pouring a shot of hot espresso over a scoop of vanilla ice cream. A perfect blend of hot and cold.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: A sweet and creamy coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, vanilla syrup, and caramel sauce. Topped with a drizzle of caramel.
